description:
Web@Mail - Mobile Mail for All !

Conkret Web@Mail is an independent and advertising-free mail service with direct access to any mailbox without any installation effort.

Manage any mailbox from multiple vendors centrally and clearly with a single login.

Web@mail is a realtime gateway. All content send to your device is preprocessed to minimize data transfer and to check your mails for harmful content and viruses.

Conkret Web@Mail is the ideal solution for those who need an independent access to their mail- whether privately or as a company!

- Optimized for minimal data transfer
- Easy to use
- All your mailboxes in one place
- Provider-Independent
- Integrated document viewer
- No Advertising
- IMAP and POP3
- International
- Virus protection in real-time
versionNote:
more useability:
- Store your inputs
- Quick Links for writing a mail and for going back (a Command menu like in the web app is visible after succesful login)
- Improved error handling when user input wrong data. The password is case sensitive!
- Added support for Chinese character set "big5ext"
- Bug fix for links not working
